scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: node "scripts/pre-build.js" && cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm start
scripts.start:legacy: concurrently "cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
